info.title: Reactions API for Posthoop social network

get.summary: Returns post status where id is uid_post
get.description: retrieve like share view and react for a post id

get.summary: Returns 1 if user liked this post
get.description: id is uid_post, uid_user is uid_user

post.summary: Returns 1 after added like on this id_post for uid_user

delete.summary: Remove like on post(id) for this user(uid_user)

post.summary: Add reaction(react) on this post(id) for this user (uid_user)

delete.summary: Remove reaction(react) on post(id) for this user(uid_user)

put.summary: Returns view counter after increment it by 1
Returns share counter after increment it by 1
